game_description: MADDOG MCGEE and his band of bandit kin have taken over the town of Sanguine Springs! Do you have what it takes to send 'em packin'? Saddle up, Ranger! It's time to ride again! CLASSIC quickdraw arcade action meets HOLOGRAPHIC video and VR! FREE forever! Comfort Warning: CHEESY ACTING
review_1: Very well made for a free pandemic production, I know I'd pay for a longer sequel. The alternate voice lines depending on how you did was a nice touch.
review_2: Very simple game. You walk around a wild West town, meeting cheesy actors one by one, then having a shootout. It's really fun and addictive. I really like this game
review_3: This is quite literally the best vr game Iâ€™ve ever played I hope to see more games like it
review_4: Probably the best game I've ever played, not only on vr but ever.
review_5: Though a touch off and a bit buggy, it is fun to actually quickdraw and hipfire. Well done you all! Cant wait for Mad Dog 22
